languages.text: "В его преступлении мне видится проблема серьезнее. Наставники в {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Схола Прогениум{/g}, не распознавшие в нем слабость, и даже сам Лорд-маршал Гореман, доверивший Страксу высокий ранг, — на них всех может лежать часть вины. Я больше не склонюсь перед старшими чинами Арбитес — каждый из них может оказаться недостойным".

"I see a far more serious problem in his crime. Both his mentors at the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g} who overlooked his weakness and even Lord Marshal Goreman himself, who granted Strachs his high rank — part of the blame may lie with them. I will never bow down to the senior officers of the Arbites again — any one of them could be unworthy of their station."
languages.original_text: "В его преступлении мне видится проблема серьезнее. Наставники в {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Схола Прогениум{/g}, не распознавшие в нем слабость, и даже сам Лорд-маршал Гореман, доверивший Страксу высокий ранг, — на них всех может лежать часть вины. Я больше не склонюсь перед старшими чинами Арбитес — каждый из них может оказаться недостойным".

I will never bow down to the senior officers of the Arbites again — any of them could be unworthy of their station."

Both his mentors at the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g} who overlooked his weakness and even Lord Marshal Goreman himself, who granted Strachs his high rank — part of the blame may lie with them. I will never bow down to the senior officers of the Arbites again — any one of them could be unworthy of their station."

languages.text: 「私は、彼の罪の中にもっと深刻な問題を見ています。彼の弱さを見逃した{g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}帝国教導院{/g}時代のメンターたち、そしてストラッチスに高い地位を与えたロード・ゴーマン将帥―その責任の一端は、彼らにもあるかもしれません。私は二度と高等裁定局の上層部に頭を下げることはないでしょう。彼らのうち誰であれ、その地位に値しない者かもしれませんから」
languages.original_text: "I see a far more serious problem in his crime. Both his mentors at the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g} who overlooked his weakness and even Lord Marshal Goreman himself, who granted Strachs his high rank — part of the blame may lie with them. I will never bow down to the senior officers of the Arbites again — any one of them could be unworthy of their station."

traits.locale_text: 「私は、彼の罪の中にもっと深刻な問題を見ています。彼の弱さを見逃した帝国教導院時代のメンターたち、そしてストラッチスに高い地位を与えたロード・ゴーマン将帥―その責任の一端は、彼らにもあるかもしれません。私は二度と高等裁定局の上層部に頭を下げることはないでしょう。彼らのうち誰であれ、その地位に値しない者かもしれませんから」

languages.text: "Ich sehe in seinem Verbrechen ein weitaus größeres Problem. Er hatte zwei Mentoren in der {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g}, und beide haben seine Schwäche übersehen, genau wie Lord-Marschall Goreman selbst, der Strachs seinen hohen Rang verliehen hat – ein Teil der Schuld liegt auch bei ihnen. Ich werde nie wieder vor den leitenden Offizieren der Arbites buckeln – jeder von ihnen könnte seines Postens unwürdig sein."
languages.original_text: "I see a far more serious problem in his crime. Both his mentors at the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g} who overlooked his weakness and even Lord Marshal Goreman himself, who granted Strachs his high rank — part of the blame may lie with them. I will never bow down to the senior officers of the Arbites again — any one of them could be unworthy of their station."

traits.locale_text: "Ich sehe in seinem Verbrechen ein weitaus größeres Problem. Er hatte zwei Mentoren in der {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g}, und beide haben seine Schwäche übersehen, genau wie Lord-Marschall Goreman selbst, der Strachs seinen hohen Rang verliehen hat – ein Teil der Schuld liegt auch bei ihnen. Ich werde nie wieder vor den leitenden Offizieren der Arbites buckeln – jeder von ihnen könnte seines Postens unwürdig sein."

languages.text: « Mais ce crime révèle un problème bien plus important, selon moi. Strachs n'est pas l'unique coupable : ses mentors de la {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g} et le Seigneur Maréchal Goreman lui-même sont également coupables d'avoir respectivement sous-estimé ses faiblesses et lui avoir conféré de telles responsabilités. Jamais plus je ne m'inclinerai face aux officiers supérieurs de l'Arbites : chacun d'entre eux est susceptible d'être indigne de son poste. »
languages.original_text: "I see a far more serious problem in his crime. Both his mentors at the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g} who overlooked his weakness and even Lord Marshal Goreman himself, who granted Strachs his high rank — part of the blame may lie with them. I will never bow down to the senior officers of the Arbites again — any one of them could be unworthy of their station."

traits.locale_text: « Mais ce crime révèle un problème bien plus important, selon moi. Strachs n'est pas l'unique coupable : ses mentors de la {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g} et le Seigneur Maréchal Goreman lui-même sont également coupables d'avoir respectivement sous-estimé ses faiblesses et lui avoir conféré de telles responsabilités. Jamais plus je ne m'inclinerai face aux officiers supérieurs de l'Arbites : chacun d'entre eux est susceptible d'être indigne de son poste. »

languages.text: «Yo veo un problema mucho más grave en su delito. Tanto sus mentores de la {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g}, que pasaron por alto su debilidad, e incluso el propio Lord Mariscal Goreman, que otorgó a Strachs su ilustre cargo; parte de la culpa podría recaer sobre ellos. Yo jamás volveré a someterme a los oficiales superiores del Arbites; cualquiera de ellos podría no ser digno de su puesto».
languages.original_text: "I see a far more serious problem in his crime. Both his mentors at the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g} who overlooked his weakness and even Lord Marshal Goreman himself, who granted Strachs his high rank — part of the blame may lie with them. I will never bow down to the senior officers of the Arbites again — any one of them could be unworthy of their station."

traits.locale_text: «Yo veo un problema mucho más grave en su delito. Tanto sus mentores de la {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g}, que pasaron por alto su debilidad, e incluso el propio Lord Mariscal Goreman, que otorgó a Strachs su ilustre cargo; parte de la culpa podría recaer sobre ellos. Yo jamás volveré a someterme a los oficiales superiores del Arbites; cualquiera de ellos podría no ser digno de su puesto».

languages.text: “从他的罪行之中，我看到了别的问题，而这个问题要严重得多。无论是斯塔克斯在{g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}忠嗣学院{/g}的导师，还是亲自授予他高阶职位的领主统帅戈尔曼本人，都忽视了他人性中的弱点，这些人都要承担一部分责任。从今以后，我再也不会对法务部的高级官员卑躬屈膝了，他们之中没人能配得上他们的职位。”
languages.original_text: "I see a far more serious problem in his crime. Both his mentors at the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g} who overlooked his weakness and even Lord Marshal Goreman himself, who granted Strachs his high rank — part of the blame may lie with them. I will never bow down to the senior officers of the Arbites again — any one of them could be unworthy of their station."

traits.locale_text: “从他的罪行之中，我看到了别的问题，而这个问题要严重得多。无论是斯塔克斯在{g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}忠嗣学院{/g}的导师，还是亲自授予他高阶职位的领主统帅戈尔曼本人，都忽视了他人性中的弱点，这些人都要承担一部分责任。从今以后，我再也不会对法务部的高级官员卑躬屈膝了，他们之中没人能配得上他们的职位。”

languages.text: "İşlediği suçla ilgili çok daha ciddi bir sorun var. Hem zayıflığını gözden kaçıran {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g}'daki akıl hocalarının hem de Strachs'a yüksek rütbesini veren Ferik Goreman'ın bizzat kendisinin bu suçu paylaştığını düşünüyorum. Bir daha asla Arbites'in kıdemli subaylarına boyun eğmeyeceğim. Hepsi makamına layık olmayabilir."
languages.original_text: "I see a far more serious problem in his crime. Both his mentors at the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g} who overlooked his weakness and even Lord Marshal Goreman himself, who granted Strachs his high rank — part of the blame may lie with them. I will never bow down to the senior officers of the Arbites again — any one of them could be unworthy of their station."

Bir daha asla Arbites'in kıdemli subaylarına boyun eğmeyeceğim. Hepsi makamına layık olmayabilir."

I will never bow down to the senior officers of the Arbites again — any one of them could be unworthy of their station."
